title: Linker - Novel Updates
tags: Dungeons   Dystopia   Hunters   Interdimensional Travel   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Parallel Worlds   Second Chance   Weak to Strong
author: King Maker   킹메이커
description:
Major Kang Young-hoon of the Strike Team.

The moment he died, he possessed his former self of 9 years before his death.

A C-Class ability user with 9 years of experience, this is the story of Kang Young-hoon's new life.>
